# allowsDocumentCreation

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the document browser can create new documents.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var allowsDocumentCreation: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The browser creates new documents when the user taps the Add (+) button in the navigation bar. The Add button is enabled only if both the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocumentBrowserViewController/allowsDocumentCreation] property is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], and the browser delegate implements the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocumentBrowserViewControllerDelegate/documentBrowser(_:didRequestDocumentCreationWithHandler:)] method.

By default, this property is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Configuring a document browser

- **allowsPickingMultipleItems**: A Boolean value that determines whether the user can select and open more than one document at a time.
- **revealDocument(at:importIfNeeded:completion:)**: Reveals, and optionally imports, the document at the provided URL.
- **contentTypesForRecentDocuments**: Content types for browsing recent documents.
